abstract: Jamaica's Parliament approves law decriminalizing possession of small amounts of marijuana and establishing licensing agency to regulate medical marijuana industry.
lead_paragraph: Marijuana has been pervasive but illegal in Jamaica for decades, consumed as a medicinal herb, puffed as a sacrament by Rastafarians and sung about in the island’s famed reggae music.
snippet: Marijuana has been pervasive but illegal in Jamaica for decades, consumed as a medicinal herb, puffed as a sacrament by Rastafarians and sung about in the island’s famed reggae music.
